name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: procedure_name_PVA
description: Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation, including Percutaneous Vertebroplasty (PVP) or Kyphoplasty (PKP)

name: diagnosis_osteoporotic_VCF
description: Diagnosis of Osteoporotic Vertebral Compression Fracture (VCF)

name: VCF_onset_status
description: Status of Osteoporotic Vertebral Compression Fracture onset (Acute or Subacute)

name: VCF_onset_acute_window_weeks
description: Timeframe for acute VCF onset, less than 6 weeks

name: VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks
description: Timeframe for subacute VCF onset, 6 to 12 weeks

name: VCF_anatomical_location
description: Anatomical location of the vertebral compression fracture (T1-L5)

name: VCF_imaging_bone_marrow_edema_MRI
description: Documentation of bone marrow edema on MRI for VCF diagnosis

name: VCF_imaging_bone_scan_uptake
description: Documentation of bone-scan uptake for VCF diagnosis

name: VCF_imaging_SPECT_CT_uptake
description: Documentation of SPECT/CT uptake for VCF diagnosis

name: patient_hospitalization_status
description: Indicates if the patient is currently hospitalized

name: pain_score_NRS_hospitalized
description: Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) pain score for hospitalized patients (threshold >= 8)

name: pain_score_VAS_hospitalized
description: Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score for hospitalized patients (threshold >= 8)

name: pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized
description: Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) pain score for non-hospitalized patients (threshold >= 5)

name: pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized
description: Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score for non-hospitalized patients (threshold >= 5)

name: non_surgical_management_attempted
description: Indicates if optimal non-surgical management (NSM) has been attempted for VCF pain

name: pain_worsening_status
description: Indicates if the patient's pain has worsened

name: vertebral_body_height_loss_progression
description: Indicates progression of vertebral body height loss

name: vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage
description: Percentage of vertebral body height reduction (threshold > 25%)

name: kyphotic_deformity_present
description: Indicates presence of kyphotic deformity

name: daily_functioning_RDQ_score
description: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire (RDQ) score indicating severe impact of VCF on daily functioning (threshold > 17)

name: BMD_evaluation_referral_required
description: Requirement for referral for evaluation of Bone Mineral Density (BMD) for VCF patients

name: osteoporosis_education_referral_required
description: Requirement for referral for osteoporosis education for VCF patients

name: osteoporosis_program_participation_required
description: Requirement for instruction to participate in an osteoporosis prevention/treatment program for VCF patients

name: back_pain_not_primarily_VCF_related
description: Exclusion: True if current back pain is not primarily due to the identified acute or subacute VCF(s)

name: diagnosis_osteomyelitis
description: Exclusion: True if diagnosis of osteomyelitis is present

name: diagnosis_discitis
description: Exclusion: True if diagnosis of discitis is present

name: diagnosis_active_systemic_infection
description: Exclusion: True if diagnosis of active systemic infection is present

name: diagnosis_active_surgical_site_infection
description: Exclusion: True if diagnosis of active surgical site infection is present

name: patient_pregnancy_status
description: Exclusion: True if patient is pregnant

name: vertebral_fracture_count_per_procedure_exceeds_three
description: Exclusion: True if more than three vertebral fractures per procedure are present

name: allergy_bone_cement
description: Exclusion: True if allergy to bone cement is present

name: allergy_opacification_agents
description: Exclusion: True if allergy to opacification agents is present

name: diagnosis_uncorrected_coagulopathy
description: Exclusion: True if diagnosis of uncorrected coagulopathy is present

name: diagnosis_spinal_instability
description: Exclusion: True if diagnosis of spinal instability is present

name: diagnosis_myelopathy_from_fracture
description: Exclusion: True if myelopathy from the fracture is present

name: diagnosis_neurologic_deficit
description: Exclusion: True if neurologic deficit is present

name: diagnosis_neural_impingement
description: Exclusion: True if neural impingement is present

name: diagnosis_fracture_retropulsion
description: Exclusion: True if fracture retropulsion is present

name: diagnosis_canal_compromise
description: Exclusion: True if canal compromise is present

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: Covered CPT procedure codes for Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation (22510, 22511, 22512, 22513, 22514, 22515)
